title: Flask Task Manager
description: This project is a task manager web application that allows you to add, remove, and update tasks. It was made completely from scratch using Python Flask.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: This project is the one you're looking at right now! To create this, I used React for the backend and database. I did the front end using JavaScript and CSS, as well as taking designs from Figma.

title: Finance Tracker
description: This web application allows a business to manage its finances, showing data through graphs and even predicting future finances using a machine learning algorithm. This web application was composed using the MERN stack.
